theme.aborted: I didn't receive your reply. Game aborted...

fail.already:
There is already an on-going Akinator game in this channel!
> **Channel ID:** %channel.id%
> **Channel name:** %channel.name%

startup.message: Starting up a game in this channel...

run.question: Question: %question_count%
run.instruction_react: Choose your answer by reacting to those:
run.answers_react:
> ✅ Yes
> ❌ No
> ❔ Don't know
> 👍 Probably
> 👎 Probably not
run.footer:
Current player: %player%
Please wait while the bot is reacting.

end.no_provided_answer: No answers were provided. Stopping the game...
end.remove_msg_20s: This message will be automatically removed in 20 seconds.
end.no_correct: No reply was provided. I guess I was right.
end.aki_win: Great, guessed right one more time!
end.aki_lose_ask: If I was wrong, what is your answer?
end.aki_lose_ans: Answer by typing in the chat.
end.aki_lose_win: Well. I didn't get your answer so I guess I was right.

start.description: Start the Akinator game with a specific theme based on user's language.
